title: Cime Alert 05.17.19
itunes:title: Cime Alert 05.17.19
description:
Woman who pushed elderly man off a bus facing murder charges after he hits his head on the concrete and dies. Man claims he "accidentally" shot and killed three women. Bill Cosby pampered in prison, according to former inmate.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
